players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "Everyone, I am the detective and I investigated Charlie last night. He is the mafioso. We need to vote him out today!"
Charlie: "Bob, you're probably the mafioso trying to frame me. Why accuse so fast? Let's discuss more!"
Diana: "I trust Bob's investigation and think Charlie should be voted out today."
You: "Charlie, your attempt to frame me won't work. I stand by my investigation—you're the mafioso. Let's vote you out to end this."
Charlie: "Bob, you're desperate to frame me, but Diana, let's vote you out instead—your blind support of him is suspicious."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
